product.name: 2-in-1 Snow Suit – Water-Resistant, Insulated, Converts to a Bunting Bag
product.desc: The 2-in-1 Snow Suit is designed for warmth, versatility, and protection in cold weather. Its relaxed fit allows for easy layering, while the zippered leg design converts it from a snowsuit to a bunting bag in seconds. The PU-coated outer fabric is windproof and water-resistant (1500mm), shielding against snow and chilly winds. High-loft polyester insulation keeps little ones warm, and the soft polar fleece lining adds extra coziness. An attached insulated hood with an elastic edge ensures a secure fit that keeps warmth in, while raglan sleeves provide an extended range of motion for active movement. Thoughtful details like YKK™ two-way front zippers for easy dressing, adjustable stirrups to keep legs secure, and reflective piping for visibility make this suit a must-have for winter outings, stroller rides, and outdoor adventures.

product.name: 20th Anniversary 3-Piece Gift Set - Limited edition
product.desc:
20th Anniversary Gift Set - Limited Edition

Celebrate Stonz's 20 years of Making Outside Easy with our special Anniversary Collection! This one-time-only 3-piece gift set features a vintage logo, adding a nostalgic touch to the Plaid Canadiana-inspired design. This exclusive Gift Set ensures your little ones stay cozy and stylish throughout the cooler months. Perfect for kids aged 1-3 years, this set includes our iconic fleece-lined winter booties, a cozy beanie, and soft bootie liners—all crafted with the quality and care you've come to expect from us for over two decades.

product.name: Baby and Kid's UV Protection Sun Suit
product.desc:
Sun Suit for Toddlers with UPF 50+

This summer, skip the sunscreen hassle and keep your baby safe with our delightful sun suits. Crafted from non-toxic, tightly woven UPF 50+ fabric, this versatile bathing suit will quickly become a wardrobe essential. Thanks to the full-length zipper, diaper changes and potty breaks are a breeze! Offering full-body coverage, including the neck, in seconds, simply zip up their swimsuit and they're ready for fun in the sun. Perfect for any outing, whether it's the pool, beach, waterpark, or a picnic, our prints and colors stay vibrant wash after wash.

ALL CLEARANCE PRICE PRODUCTS ARE FINAL SALE, NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.

product.name: Baby and Kids' Waterproof Rain Suit - SALE
product.desc:
Keep little explorers dry, comfortable, and adventure-ready in any weather with the Stonz Rainsuit! Designed for toddlers, this waterproof one-piece rain suit features fully seam-sealed, breathable fabric to block rain while preventing overheating. The lightweight, flexible design allows for easy layering, so kids stay warm and dry without restriction. Built for active play, it has reinforced Taslan knees and seat for extra durability, adjustable sleeves and stirrups to keep it securely in place, and a 3M AquaGuard™ waterproof zipper that seals out moisture. Reflective piping enhances visibility, adding an extra layer of safety in low-light conditions. Whether it’s puddle jumping, creek exploring, or a rainy-day adventure, this suit keeps kids protected so they can play longer—rain or shine.
ALL CLEARANCE PRICE PRODUCTS ARE FINAL SALE, NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.

product.name: Baby Willow Shoes
product.desc:
Soft Shoes for Infants

The perfect soft-sole baby shoe to complete your little one’s outfit of the day. Flexible and comfortable vegan materials designed for small, developing feet. Modern, clean design, with a subtle color palette and minimalistic look. The curved heel cups of these shoes are specifically designed to fit a baby's foot, while also helping the shoe bend and move with your little one. The best part? These infant slippers go on easily and will stay on. Stretch open the elastic cuff and slip over those chubby toes. They will not fall off, even the wiggliest babe. An excellent choice for daycare, playtime & stroller walks.

product.name: Baby Yale Shoes
product.desc:
Soft Shoes for Infants 

Baby shoes that stay on AND look cute? Yes, please! product.name: Beanie for Babies, Toddlers & Kids – Soft, Stretchy & Cozy
product.desc: A classic beanie for everyday warmth and comfort. Made from soft, double-layered 100% acrylic rib knit, this hat provides a stretchy, snug fit that stays in place without feeling too tight. The breathable fabric keeps little heads warm on chilly days while remaining lightweight enough for all-day wear. Designed for babies, toddlers, and kids, it’s an easy, fuss-free essential for cooler weather—perfect for outdoor adventures, school days, or layering up in style.

product.name: Bootie Liners for Babies & Toddlers – Extra Warm Fleece Layer
product.desc: Designed to enhance warmth in extreme cold, our Bootie Liners are the perfect companion to our Baby and Toddler Booties. Made from 100% polyester bonded fleece, they slide seamlessly inside to add an extra insulating layer. The smooth fleece exterior ensures a snug fit without bulk, while the plush sherpa lining provides soft, cozy warmth for tiny toes. Wear them pulled up for added shin coverage or fold them over the booties to showcase the fluffy sherpa cuff. Whether heading out on chilly days or braving freezing temperatures, these liners help keep little feet extra toasty.

product.name: Booties-Baby - SALE
product.desc:
Baby and Toddler Winter Booties 

Keep their little toes warm year-round. These fleece-lined winter booties are perfect for infants and early walkers that need soft non-slip boots for all weather conditions. Thanks to their weather-resistant construction, these boots for babies are a great addition for rainy-day adventures and winter snuggling alike. Warm and plush, Stonz baby and Toddler winter booties are wide enough to slip on-the-go on your little one’s feet, socks or even shoes, no fidgeting needed! Just place their foot in, and secure with the adjustable toggles. Not even your squirmiest little one will get them off!

ALL CLEARANCE PRICE PRODUCTS ARE FINAL SALE, NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES

product.name: Booties-Baby - SALE
product.desc:
Baby and Toddler Winter Booties 

Keep their little toes warm year-round. These fleece-lined winter booties are perfect for infants and early walkers that need soft non-slip boots for all weather conditions. Thanks to their weather-resistant construction, these boots for babies are a great addition for rainy-day adventures and winter snuggling alike. Warm and plush, Stonz baby and Toddler winter booties are wide enough to slip on-the-go on your little one’s feet, socks or even shoes, no fidgeting needed! Just place their foot in, and secure with the adjustable toggles. Not even your squirmiest little one will get them off!

ALL CLEARANCE PRICE PRODUCTS ARE FINAL SALE, NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES

product.name: Cruiser™ Everyday Dressy Shoes for Babies
product.desc:
APMA-Recognized First Walker Shoes for Babies – Cruiser™ Everyday Dressy 

Step into comfort and style with the Cruiser™ Dressy, the elevated version of our award-winning, APMA-recognized first walker shoes. Perfect for little feet taking their first steps, these shoes feature a weather-ready upper to keep tiny toes dry and comfy, no matter what the weather has in store. The flexible, low-profile outsole gives your baby the freedom to move and explore while supporting healthy foot development. From playtime to special occasions, the Cruiser™ Dressy is as stylish as it is practical. The easy-on, stay-on design makes life simpler for parents, while the durable materials keep your baby’s feet happy and supported every step of the way. APMA-recognized for healthy foot development, these shoes are made for the little one who’s ready to take on the world.

product.name: Cruiser™ Everyday Dressy Shoes for Toddlers
product.desc:
APMA-Recognized First Walker Shoes for Toddlers – Cruiser™ Everyday Dressy

The Cruiser™ Dressy for toddlers is designed for little feet that are always on the move. Featuring a weather-ready upper and a cupped outsole with high sidewalls for extra stability, these APMA-recognized shoes are the perfect shoes for toddlers who love to explore, rain or shine. Built to keep up with every adventure, from rainy days to playdates and even special occasions, the Cruiser™ Dressy offers the perfect combination of style and functionality. The easy-on, stay-on fit ensures no-fuss wear, while the durable construction keeps up with your toddler's every step. Stylish, comfortable, and versatile, these shoes are ready for whatever the day brings.

The Cruiser™ Dressy for toddlers is designed for little feet that are always on the move. Featuring a weather-ready upper and a cupped outsole with high sidewalls for extra stability, these APMA-recognized shoes are the perfect shoes for toddlers who love to explore, rain or shine. Built to keep up with every adventure, from rainy days to playdates and even special occasions, the Cruiser™ Dressy offers the perfect combination of style and functionality. The easy-on, stay-on fit ensures no-fuss wear, while the durable construction keeps up with your toddler's every step. Stylish, comfortable, and versatile, these shoes are ready for whatever the day brings.

product.name: Cruiser™ Natural Shoes for Babies
product.desc: The Cruiser™ Natural Baby combines natural materials with thoughtful design for your baby’s first steps. Featuring an APMA-recognized ergonomic construction, these shoes promote natural foot development with a lightweight, flexible sole. The upper is crafted from a durable blend of 65% recycled cotton and 35% cotton canvas, offering breathability, comfort, and a soft, natural feel. A cork-topped insole provides extra cushioning while ensuring a secure fit. Designed for early walkers, these shoes are lightweight, machine washable, and easy to put on—perfect for growing feet and busy parents alike.

product.name: Cruiser™ Natural Shoes for Toddlers
product.desc: The Cruiser™ Natural Toddler blends natural materials with enhanced support for confident walkers. Recognized by the APMA for promoting foot health, these shoes feature a durable cupped outsole for added stability and a lightweight, flexible build that encourages healthy movement. The breathable upper, made from 65% recycled cotton and 35% cotton canvas, provides a comfortable, secure fit. A cork-topped insole adds extra cushioning for all-day wear, while the ergonomic design supports growing feet. Machine-washable and easy to wear, these stylish, functional shoes are perfect for toddlers mastering their stride.

product.name: Cruiser™ Original Mary Jane Shoes for Babies
product.desc: Stylish, supportive, and baby-friendly, the Cruiser™ Original Mary Jane combines thoughtful design with a timeless look. These Podiatrist-recognized shoes feature a zero-drop sole, wide toe box, and ergonomic construction to support natural foot development and alignment. Two included insoles—one thinner (3mm) and one thicker (6mm)—allow you to adjust the fit as your baby grows, ensuring all-day comfort. Crafted from safe, non-toxic materials, the Cruiser Mary Jane features a breathable air mesh upper to keep little feet cool and a flexible rubber outsole for balance and durability. With an easy-on, stay-put design, these lightweight shoes are perfect for early walkers mastering milestones in style.

product.name: Cruiser™ Original Mary Jane Shoes for Toddlers
product.desc: The Cruiser™ Original Mary Jane Toddler blends classic style with the support toddlers need for confident steps. Recognized by both the American Podiatric Medical Association (APMA) & (CPMA) for promoting foot health, these shoes feature a cupped outsole with high sidewalls for extra stability and balance. The ergonomic, zero-drop design encourages natural alignment, while two included insoles—one thinner (3mm) and one thicker (6mm)—allow for a customizable fit as your child grows. Made with safe, non-toxic materials, the breathable air mesh upper keeps little feet cool and comfortable, while the flexible rubber outsole supports natural movement and active play. Lightweight, machine-washable, and easy to slip on, these shoes are ready for every adventure.

Lightweight, machine-washable, and easy to slip on, these shoes are ready for every adventure.

product.name: Cruiser™ Original Shoes for Babies
product.desc:
Flexible, adjustable, & breathable shoes for babies!

The Cruiser™ Original Baby is thoughtfully designed to support early walkers as they take their first steps. Featuring a breathable 95% polyester and 5% elastane air mesh upper, it keeps little feet cool and comfortable during active play. The zero-drop sole and wide toe box promote natural alignment, balance, and healthy foot development, while the flexible natural rubber outsole offers slip-resistant traction and durability. With its easy-on hook and loop closure, this shoe ensures a secure fit that stays in place, even during wiggly moments. Machine washable and crafted with hypoallergenic, low-VOC materials, the APMA-recognized Cruiser™ Original Baby is a safe, reliable choice for little ones learning to explore their world.

The zero-drop sole and wide toe box promote natural alignment, balance, and healthy foot development, while the flexible natural rubber outsole offers slip-resistant traction and durability. With its easy-on hook and loop closure, this shoe ensures a secure fit that stays in place, even during wiggly moments. Machine washable and crafted with hypoallergenic, low-VOC materials, the APMA-recognized Cruiser™ Original Baby is a safe, reliable choice for little ones learning to explore their world.

product.name: Cruiser™ Original Shoes for Toddlers
product.desc:
Perfect toddler shoe, sizes from 8 to 12

The Cruiser™ Original Toddler is built for growing feet, offering the perfect balance of comfort, support, and durability for active walkers. Its cupped outsole with raised sidewalls provides added stability, while the zero-drop design encourages natural alignment and balance. Made with a breathable air mesh upper and flexible natural rubber outsole, these shoes keep little feet cool and supported through every adventure. The easy-on hook and loop closure system empowers kids to put their shoes on themselves, fostering autonomy and motor skill development, while saving parents time during busy mornings. Machine washable and APMA-recognized, these hypoallergenic, low-VOC shoes are designed to keep up with the energy and needs of confident walkers.

Machine washable and APMA-recognized, these hypoallergenic, low-VOC shoes are designed to keep up with the energy and needs of confident walkers.

product.name: Eco Sunnies – Polarized UV 400 Sunglasses for Toddlers & Kids
product.desc:
Protect little eyes with Eco Sunnies—polarized sunglasses designed for toddlers and kids (ages 2-6). Featuring UV 400 lenses, they block 100% of UVA & UVB rays, reducing glare and keeping vision clear on bright days. The shatter-resistant, impact-resistant lenses offer extra durability, making them perfect for active kids.

Crafted from 100% recycled fishing nets, the lightweight yet sturdy frames are both eco-friendly and tough enough to handle drops, bends, and everyday adventures. Designed for a secure, comfortable fit, they sit snugly on little faces without slipping.

Stylish, protective, and made for play—Eco Sunnies keep kids safe while helping keep plastic out of the ocean.
ALL CLEARANCE PRICE PRODUCTS ARE FINAL SALE, NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.

product.name: Explorer Sun Hat for Babies, Toddlers and Kids
product.desc:
Built for sunny adventures, the Stonz Explorer Hat offers all-day protection and comfort. Made with UPF 50+ fabric and a wide brim with extended neck coverage, it shields little ones from harmful UV rays. The DWR-coated Taslan fabric repels light rain and dries quickly, while the breathable mesh lining and moisture-wicking sweatband keep kids cool.

With adjustable toggles at the crown and chin, this hat provides a secure, customizable fit that grows with your child. The crushable brim makes it easy to pack, and snap-up sides offer flexible coverage. Perfect for camping, hiking, and everyday outdoor play.

product.name: Fleece Hat for Baby and Toddler - Sherpa Lined with Chin Strap
product.desc: Keep little heads warm and cozy all winter long with our Baby & Toddler Fleece Hat. The durable polar fleece outer shields against chilly winds, while the plush sherpa lining provides soft, insulating warmth. A built-in chin strap ensures full ear coverage and secures comfortably under the chin with an easy hook-and-loop closure—so it stays in place through every outdoor adventure. Thoughtfully designed for little hands, kids can put it on themselves, encouraging independence while ensuring a snug, stay-put fit. Whether they’re playing in the snow or heading out for a winter walk, this hat offers the perfect blend of warmth, comfort, and easy wearability.

product.name: Fleece Mitts for Babies– Soft, Cozy, and Breathable Baby Mittens
product.desc: The Fleece Mitts for Babies are designed for soft, breathable warmth on cooler days. Made with plush boucle fleece, they keep little hands cozy and comfortable without overheating. The thumbless design and wide opening make them easy to slip on, while the ribbed cuffs provide a gentle, stay-put fit that keeps warmth in. The soft polar fleece lining adds an extra layer of comfort, making these mitts perfect for stroller rides, outdoor walks, or everyday wear. A built-in clip keeps them together when not in use, so they’re always easy to find.

The thumbless design and wide opening make them easy to slip on, while the ribbed cuffs provide a gentle, stay-put fit that keeps warmth in. The soft polar fleece lining adds an extra layer of comfort, making these mitts perfect for stroller rides, outdoor walks, or everyday wear. A built-in clip keeps them together when not in use, so they’re always easy to find.

product.name: Kids' West Waterproof Boots - SALE
product.desc: The durable, all-season West Boot keeps kids warm, dry, and ready to explore—from rainy days to milder winters—so you can say yes to more “outdoor time” without hesitation. Cold rated to about -4ºF / -20ºC, it uses a fully waterproof rubber shell with a soft 6 mm neoprene lining to trap warmth without unnecessary bulk, keeping little toes cozy even when the day runs colder than expected. A deeply lugged, extra-grippy outsole helps prevent slips on wet or slippery surfaces, giving parents a little extra peace of mind during those fearless, full-speed adventures. Made with chemical-free, vegan-friendly materials and designed for year-round wear—from puddles and mud to light snow—the West keeps little feet protected, stable, and comfortable while they play and explore

Cold rated to about -4ºF / -20ºC, it uses a fully waterproof rubber shell with a soft 6 mm neoprene lining to trap warmth without unnecessary bulk, keeping little toes cozy even when the day runs colder than expected. A deeply lugged, extra-grippy outsole helps prevent slips on wet or slippery surfaces, giving parents a little extra peace of mind during those fearless, full-speed adventures. Made with chemical-free, vegan-friendly materials and designed for year-round wear—from puddles and mud to light snow—the West keeps little feet protected, stable, and comfortable while they play and explore

product.name: Pom Beanie for Babies, Toddlers & Kids – Soft, Stretchy & Cozy
product.desc: A classic beanie with a playful twist! Topped with a soft, fluffy pom pom, this cozy knit hat adds a fun touch to any cold-weather outfit. Made from double-layered 100% acrylic rib knit, it provides a snug, stretchy fit that stays in place while keeping little heads warm and comfortable. The breathable yet insulating design ensures warmth without overheating, making it a go-to for chilly days. Perfect for daycare, family outings, or outdoor play, this beanie combines everyday comfort with a bit of extra charm.

product.name: Puffer Bootie Baby – Insulated, Water-Resistant Baby Booties
product.desc: The Puffer Bootie Baby is designed to keep little feet warm, cozy, and secure. Lightweight and insulated with 3M™ Thinsulate™ 150G, and cold rated to -20ºC (-4ºF), they provide exceptional warmth without bulk. The water-repellant nylon upper repels moisture, while the soft polar fleece lining keeps feet dry and comfortable. Featuring dual elastic pull cords at the ankle and top, these booties are designed to stay on securely when worn over socks or shoes. The flexible, non-slip PU sole offers stability for early steps or stroller rides. Perfect for quick outings or all-day wear, these puffy booties make getting out the door fast and stress-free.

product.name: Puffer Bootie Toddler – Insulated, Water-Resistant Cold Weather Booties
product.desc:
Toddler Booties Puffer

Perfect for your little explorer out in cold weather, Stonz Puffer Toddler Booties keep their feet dry & warm even in the middle of winter. The Stonz Puffer Toddler Booties use 3M thinsulate to keep them cozy in temperatures as low as -20ºC. Easy to get on and off for any impromptu backyard play session, these soft-sole non-slip shoes are perfect for early walkers that still have wobbly steps. Warm without being bulky, these versatile puffer booties were made for kids (and parents) on the go: lightweight for toting around in your diaper bag and with an extra-wide opening that easily covers shoes or liners. Got a wiggly baby? Just secure with the toggle closure and you’re done: no amount of kicking and playing will get these off!

Easy to get on and off for any impromptu backyard play session, these soft-sole non-slip shoes are perfect for early walkers that still have wobbly steps. Warm without being bulky, these versatile puffer booties were made for kids (and parents) on the go: lightweight for toting around in your diaper bag and with an extra-wide opening that easily covers shoes or liners. Got a wiggly baby? Just secure with the toggle closure and you’re done: no amount of kicking and playing will get these off!

product.name: Roamer Knit Water Shoe for Babies and Toddlers
product.desc: The Roamer water shoe for kids combines versatility with natural support. Its zero-drop design promotes natural alignment and balance, while the breathable 80% polyester, 20% Lycra knit upper ensures airflow to keep feet cool. The TPE rubber outsole provides slip-resistant stability on wet or uneven surfaces, and the closed-cell foam insole prevents water absorption, ensuring quick-drying and hygienic wear. With an elasticated collar for a secure fit and an ergonomic design promoting natural toe splay, plus a toe bumper for added protection, the Roamer is perfect for warm days in the park, beach, or water and machine washable for easy care.

product.name: Snow Mitt Baby - Easy-on, Insulated, Waterproof Mittens
product.desc: The Snow Mitt Baby is designed to keep little hands warm, dry, and protected in cold weather. With a thumbless, easy-on design, these mittens feature a wide opening and roomy palm, making them easy to slip on while allowing babies to curl their fingers naturally. An adjustable elastic cord with a pressure toggle secures the fit, keeping mitts in place. The PU-membrane outer shell with a DWR finish is windproof and waterproof, shielding against snow and moisture. 3M™ Thinsulate™ 150G insulation provides lightweight warmth, while the soft polar fleece lining keeps hands cozy and dry. An attached clip keeps mittens together when not in use. Perfect for stroller rides, outdoor play, and everyday winter adventures.

An attached clip keeps mittens together when not in use. Perfect for stroller rides, outdoor play, and everyday winter adventures.

product.name: Snow Mitt Kid - Easy-on, Insulated, Waterproof Mittens
product.desc: The Snow Mitt Kid is designed for protection, warmth, and all-day comfort in winter conditions. Cold-rated up to -20, these mitts feature 3M™ Thinsulate™ 150G insulation for lightweight warmth and a soft polar fleece lining for cozy comfort. A fully waterproof TPU membrane between the outer shell and lining keeps hands dry in snow, slush, and wet conditions. The fleece-covered thumb allows kids to wipe their noses without irritation. Designed for easy on and off, these mitts fit over jacket sleeves, with an elastic wrist cinch and top-edge toggle for a secure, stay-put fit. The durable nylon Oxford outer shell provides windproof protection, while a PU-coated palm enhances grip and durability. When not in use, a built-in clip keeps mitts together, so they’re always easy to find. Perfect for snowy days, outdoor play, and winter sports, these mitts keep hands warm, dry, and ready for fun.

product.name: Sport Sunnies
product.desc: Protect your child’s eyes with Stonz unbreakable Sport Sunnies. Our perfect-fit baby sunglasses are designed to stay snug on their little face, without falling off! Plus, their flexible frame makes them pretty much unbreakable: no need to get them new ones every single week! Thanks to its 100% UVA and UVB protection and polarized lenses, your little outdoor explorer will be more comfortable and see better even under harsh midday sun.

product.name: Stonz E-Gift Card
product.desc:
Are you looking for a great gift but not sure what to get? Give them the gift of outdoor quality time with the little ones. Gift cards are delivered by email only and contain a code corresponding to the value of your purchase. The recipient of this gift may use the code at checkout to redeem the Gift Card value.

*Gift cards cannot be returned and are not refundable or redeemable for cash.

product.name: Sun Flap Cap for Babies and Toddlers
product.desc:
Shield your little one from the sun with the Flap Cap, designed for ultimate sun protection and all-day comfort. Made with lightweight, UPF 50+ fabric, this hat blocks harmful UV rays, keeping delicate skin safe without the need for constant sunscreen reapplication. The breathable polyester mesh side panels promote airflow, preventing overheating on warm days, while the soft, stretchy fabric ensures a snug yet comfortable fit that stays in place during playtime. Featuring a soft, flexible foam brim for gentle protection, this cap also includes a generous neck flap for extra coverage, ideal for stroller rides, beach days, and outdoor adventures. The quick-drying, moisture-wicking material keeps little explorers cool and dry, whether they’re splashing in water or running through the park. Plus, crafted from non-toxic, kid-safe materials, it’s free from harmful chemicals, giving parents peace of mind. Designed for babies and toddlers from 0 to 3 years, the Flap Cap is a must-have for sunny days, making outdoor play safer, easier, and more comfortable.
ALL CLEARANCE PRICE PRODUCTS ARE FINAL SALE, NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES.

product.name: Toddler Booties
product.desc:
Toddler Winter Booties

Keep their little toes warm year-round. These fleece-lined winter booties are perfect for toddlers and young kids that need durable non-slip shoes for all weather conditions. Thanks to their weather-resistant construction, these are a great addition for fall adventures and winter playing alike. Warm and plush, Stonz kid winter booties are wide enough to slip on-the-go on your little one’s feet, no fidgeting needed! Just place their foot in, and secure with the adjustable toggles. It’s so easy they’ll be putting them on their own in no time!

Keep their little toes warm year-round. These fleece-lined winter booties are perfect for toddlers and young kids that need durable non-slip shoes for all weather conditions. Thanks to their weather-resistant construction, these are a great addition for fall adventures and winter playing alike. Warm and plush, Stonz kid winter booties are wide enough to slip on-the-go on your little one’s feet, no fidgeting needed! Just place their foot in, and secure with the adjustable toggles. It’s so easy they’ll be putting them on their own in no time!

product.name: Trek Kid Ultra-Lightweight Insulated Winter Boot with Liner
product.desc: The ultra-lightweight Trek Kid Winter Boot keeps kids warm, dry, and comfortable all season long. Cold-rated to -30°C/-22F, it features a water-resistant polyester upper with a DWR finish, a removable felt liner for added insulation, and a waterproof EVA outsole that offers cushioning and slip-resistant traction. An adjustable closure ensures a secure fit that’s easy for kids to manage themselves. The Trek Kid Boot now features a zero-drop sole, wider toe and heel for healthy foot development, and deep tread for better grip. Its flexible, waterproof construction and removable felt liner offer warmth and freedom to move—without the bulk. From city streets to snowy mountain trails, the Trek Kid keeps feet protected and ready for the cold winter weather. Perfect for school days and outdoor play.

product.name: Trek Toddler Ultra-Lightweight Insulated Winter Boot
product.desc: The Trek Toddler Winter Boot has been redesigned to deliver greater comfort, support, and cold-weather performance. Now ultra-lightweight, it features a zero-drop sole, wider toe box and heel to support healthy foot development, and deep tread outsoles for improved grip on varied terrain. Cold-rated to -30°C/-22F, the Trek pairs a fully waterproof bottom with a water-resistant, insulated upper and plush faux fur lining for lasting warmth. The flexible EVA construction allows natural movement without bulk, while the wide opening and adjustable strap make for quick on-and-off and a secure fit. From city streets to mountain trails and everywhere in between, the Trek keeps feet protected, supported, and ready for whatever the season brings.

Cold-rated to -30°C/-22F, the Trek pairs a fully waterproof bottom with a water-resistant, insulated upper and plush faux fur lining for lasting warmth. The flexible EVA construction allows natural movement without bulk, while the wide opening and adjustable strap make for quick on-and-off and a secure fit. From city streets to mountain trails and everywhere in between, the Trek keeps feet protected, supported, and ready for whatever the season brings.

product.name: Urban Waterproof Rain Boot for Kids
product.desc: Durable, cozy, and built for all-weather play, the Urban Rain Boot keeps little feet warm, dry, and comfortable. Made with 52% natural rubber, it’s waterproof, flexible, and free from harmful chemicals like PVC. The 6mm fleece lining provides extra warmth, while the wide toe box supports natural movement. A slip-resistant sole offers traction on wet surfaces, and the 3mm EVA insole cushions every step. With an easy-on elastic gore covered by rubber panels to keep moisture out, this boot is perfect for puddles, play, and chilly days.

product.name: Waterproof Rain Boots for Toddlers and Kids
product.desc: Durable, flexible, and made for adventure—Stonz Rain Boots keep little feet dry and comfy, rain or shine! Crafted with 52% natural rubber, these boots are waterproof, super flexible, and built to last, so kids can explore freely in any weather. Designed with growing feet in mind, they feature a wide toe box for natural movement, a soft, breathable textile lining, and a slip-resistant sole for traction on wet surfaces. The 3mm EVA insole adds extra cushioning, while the mid-shin height provides extra splash protection. Each pair is carefully handcrafted, ensuring a premium finish that supports all-day outdoor play—no matter the forecast.

Crafted with 52% natural rubber, these boots are waterproof, super flexible, and built to last, so kids can explore freely in any weather. Designed with growing feet in mind, they feature a wide toe box for natural movement, a soft, breathable textile lining, and a slip-resistant sole for traction on wet surfaces. The 3mm EVA insole adds extra cushioning, while the mid-shin height provides extra splash protection. Each pair is carefully handcrafted, ensuring a premium finish that supports all-day outdoor play—no matter the forecast.

product.name: Waterproof Rain Jacket for Babies, Toddlers and Kids
product.desc:
Ready for every rainy-day adventure, the Stonz Rain Jacket keeps kids dry, comfortable, and protected in wet and windy weather. Made from fully waterproof, 10,000mm-rated ripstop nylon with sealed seams and a waterproof zipper, it provides reliable protection against the elements while staying breathable. The lightweight yet ultra-durable fabric allows for unrestricted movement, and the relaxed fit with raglan sleeves ensures easy layering.

A three-piece hood with a soft visor keeps rain off little faces, while extendable sleeves grow with your child for longer-lasting wear. Reflective piping enhances visibility in low light, adding an extra layer of safety for outdoor play. Whether splashing in puddles or exploring the great outdoors, this rain jacket is built to handle it all—because rainy days should never stop the fun.

product.name: Waterproof Rain Pants for Babies, Toddlers and Kids
product.desc:
Lightweight, durable, and built for all-weather play, Stonz Rain Pants keep kids dry no matter the forecast. Made from fully waterproof, 10,000mm-rated ripstop nylon with a PU membrane and fully sealed seams, these pants block out rain and wind while staying breathable for all-day comfort.

Designed for active movement, the relaxed fit allows for easy layering, while reinforced Taslan panels at the knees and seat provide extra durability for puddle jumping, climbing, and outdoor adventures. The elasticated waistband and cuffs ensure a secure, flexible fit, while adjustable stirrups keep the pants in place.

For added safety, reflective piping along the legs enhances visibility in low-light conditions. Ultra-lightweight, machine washable, and designed for real weather, these rain pants make wet-weather play fun, comfortable, and mess-free.

product.name: Waterproof Rain Suit for Babies, Toddlers and Kids
product.desc: Keep little explorers dry, comfortable, and adventure-ready in any weather with the Stonz Rainsuit! Designed for toddlers, this waterproof one-piece rain suit features fully seam-sealed, breathable fabric to block rain while preventing overheating. The lightweight, flexible design allows for easy layering, so kids stay warm and dry without restriction. Built for active play, it has reinforced Taslan knees and seat for extra durability, adjustable sleeves and stirrups to keep it securely in place, and a 3M AquaGuard™ waterproof zipper that seals out moisture. Reflective piping enhances visibility, adding an extra layer of safety in low-light conditions. Whether it’s puddle jumping, creek exploring, or a rainy-day adventure, this suit keeps kids protected so they can play longer—rain or shine.

The lightweight, flexible design allows for easy layering, so kids stay warm and dry without restriction. Built for active play, it has reinforced Taslan knees and seat for extra durability, adjustable sleeves and stirrups to keep it securely in place, and a 3M AquaGuard™ waterproof zipper that seals out moisture. Reflective piping enhances visibility, adding an extra layer of safety in low-light conditions. Whether it’s puddle jumping, creek exploring, or a rainy-day adventure, this suit keeps kids protected so they can play longer—rain or shine.
